adverts.title: Soylent Green-ish Meal Replacement Paste
adverts.ad_copy: Now with 15% less ambiguity! It's the taste of a brighter, more efficient tomorrow. Probably.

adverts.title: The 'Calm' App
adverts.ad_copy: Mandatory serenity, at your fingertips. Because non-compliance is a very stressful choice.

adverts.title: NostalgiaMAX™ Subscription Service
adverts.ad_copy: Why face the future when you can re-live the tolerable parts of the past? Now featuring 'The 2040s: It Wasn't *That* Bad'.

adverts.title: Breathe-Plus® Premium Air
adverts.ad_copy: Don't settle for 'ambient'. Upgrade your atmosphere to 'Vaguely Pine-Scented' for just £19.99 a month.

adverts.title: Sentient Appliance Therapy
adverts.ad_copy: Our technicians are certified in both circuitry and existential philosophy. We'll talk your toaster down from the ledge.

adverts.title: Genuine Imitation Sunlight Bulbs
adverts.ad_copy: 99.8% as good as the real thing! We think. It's been a while.

adverts.title: Self-Driving Coffins
adverts.ad_copy: The last commute you'll ever need to worry about. Pre-book your final destination and enjoy the ride.

adverts.title: Schrödinger's Cat-in-a-Box Pet Service
adverts.ad_copy: The perfect low-maintenance companion. It is simultaneously affectionate and aloof right up until you open the box. (Do not open the box).

adverts.title: Personalised Existential Crises
adverts.ad_copy: Tired of the same old generic dread? For a small fee, we'll curate a bespoke existential crisis tailored to your unique anxieties.

adverts.title: Laughter Tracks
adverts.ad_copy: Can't quite remember the appropriate social response? We provide a full library of pre-approved chuckles, titters, and guffaws.

adverts.title: The 'It's Not A Bug, It's A Feature' Home OS
adverts.ad_copy: Your lights will flicker, your thermostat will argue, and your door may not open. But that's all part of the charming, unpredictable experience we designed.

adverts.title: MyFirstClone™ Starter Kit
adverts.ad_copy: Need someone to do the dishes, file your taxes, or attend a family gathering? Some assembly and light genetic programming required. Individuality not included.

adverts.title: Recycled Steamed Vapour
adverts.ad_copy: All the hydration of yesterday's fog, bottled for your convenience today.

adverts.title: Bureaucracy Navigation for Dummies
adverts.ad_copy: For a low, low fee, we'll wait on hold with the council for you. We can't promise results, but we can promise you won't have to listen to the hold music.

adverts.title: Insta-Queue™
adverts.ad_copy: Hate waiting? Our patented service allows you to experience the full tedium of a multi-hour queue in just five agonising minutes. Mild nausea is a sign it's working.
